label: Oya, Yuki & Hiroshi Kajihara.  2017. Description of a new Notocomplana species (Platyhelminthes: Acotylea),  new combination and new records of Polycladida from the northeastern Sea of Japan, with a comparison of two different barcoding markers. Zootaxa 4282(3): 526–542.
